ComicInfo.Title: The Worser Scrape; Tick & Artie; Duck!; Justice Is Numb; Betrayal of the Man-Eating Cow; King Arthur of Mars; The Tick Goes Shopping; The House of the Zombie-Vampires!; World War Spoon; Intellectual Pursuits; Tub Full of Evil!; Le Tick; The Return of the Chainsaw Vigilante!; Spelling Bee Blues; The Winner; Moth Magnet!; A Brief Overview of Our Champion the Tick
ComicInfo.Summary: The Tick is in prison, but reminds Arthur they've been in worse trouble, such as when they had to save Santa Claus from Darth Vader. Arthur reminds the Tick that never actually happened.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 16:49:30. [CVDB110703] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 02:25:21. [Issue ID 747620]
